Skip the agency. Skip the meetings.
Get a new hand-made logo or redesign an old one with limited back and forths.

Benefits

  • unlimited revisions within the week

  • no meetings -- async communication

  • no arduous process -- keep it simple

  • 100% custom logo not made by a robot

This only works if we follow a tight process

  1. Kickoff: our and only meeting where we align on your vision and needs.
  2. Draft: I share 2-3 rough concepts with you. You pick one.
  3. Refine: I go back to nip and tuck, button up, and dial in your new logo. Here, we'll do up to 3 rounds.
  4. Deliver: I email you the logo, colors, and fonts you need for web and print.

The long drawn-out process of brand creation absolutely has a place and is here to stay, but it's not for all of us.

Logo in-a-week reinvents the branding process by optimizing for speed while keeping the quality as high as humanly possible.

It prevents sprawl, prevents scope creep, and laser-focuses the decision-making process.

Meetings, revisions, corralling everyone‚Äôs input. This can be arduous because you want to do it right for this mark will represent your company or org maybe for decades.

You also have to be open to a completely radical idea that goes against every way of thinking of commerce and buying things and exchanging services for money...

Cost

This service follows the gift-economy model.

Meaning I'm prepared to give you this as a gift and you are welcome at the end of it to pay me, in money or other, or some other way.

I think this is really important right now because assigning a dollar amount to every single thing in our lives slowly corrodes relationships.

I'm doing this as an experiment to see if I can meet some cool people, exchange a service.

FAQ

Why not 2 weeks?

I believe that working within constraints allows space for excellent work.

It forces you, the business owner, to make decisions and not waddle, waffle.

And it forces me, the designer, to also make decisions and crank out excellent designs.

And make sure it can be good for creative things.

More to come....

Logos are magic.

They have the power to communicate your values, philosophy, reputation, and what customers can expect by using succinct imagery.

Branding is the whole thing - the combination of messaging and visuals you consistently use. Your logo is the core of your brand.

With this service, it‚Äôs up to you to apply and express the logo in ways that resonate with your audience.

In a world where we incessantly research products before buying, first impressions are key.

That initial impact matters.

Branding is the promise, but it is your responsibility as a business to back it up with action.

Schedule a quick zoom call to see if this service is right for you

If it's a fit, I'll send you a form. Take your time to fill it out with your vision and goals for the logo.

Then we'll have one call and as many revisions as we can fit in a week.

At the end of the week you'll have your new logo.
